news.title: How to use MetaMask Buy option to put money inside your wallet
news.subtitle: MetaMask Portfolio get this Buy thing wey you fit use change your regular money (like Naira) to crypto for just a few clicks.

childMarkdownRemark.html:
MetaMask Portfolio get this Buy thing wey you fit use am buy crypto for easy with other people wey dey offer the service. Dem design am with you for mind, di Buy thing make everything easy and simple, you fit put money for your wallet with just few clicks.


Sellers wey dem approve


Instead make you dey limited to one person wey dey sell, MetaMask gather many different people wey dey sell wey we don check well well‚Äî to make sure them dey good‚Äîto give you the best price for your crypto wey you wan buy. To gather prices from different sources go give you plenty options to compare and select the one wey sweet you pass.

Prices wey dem fit make special for you


Everybody get different reasons why dem dey buy crypto and how them want pay. Na why we consider plenty things to give you price wey dey special for you.

  • Region: E dey available for people wey dey 189 different countries to use.
  • Way to Pay: The ways to pay go dey different depending on where you dey. Pick the way you wan pay: debit card or credit card, PayPal (U.S. except for Hawaii), Transfer money from bank, quick ACH, and oda local payment methods. More ways wey you fit pay go soon dey added.
  • Token: You fit buy over 90 different crypto things for more than 10 networks, like Ethereum, Polygon, Optimism, Arbitrum, Binance Smart Chain, Avalanche, Fantom, and Celo, plus some more.
  • Amount: Depending on di area wey you choose and their many KYC rules, how much you fit buy at once fit get limit.

Put money for your wallet sharp sharp


Your wallet balance go update by itself for MetaMask once you don buy am finish from the provider wey you buy am. You fit send money from any exchange straight to MetaMask now, no more waiting.

We dey welcome users wey just join from all over the world


Web3 dey everywhere, and we suppose welcome people to crypto like dat too. Since dem launch de aggregator, MetaMask dey try partner with people all over de world to help anyone, ‚Äîno matter where you dey‚Äî to enter web3.

We want this thing to be the perfect place for new people wey just dey come into web3 so dem fit start to do oda important things.

How to use di Buy feature for MetaMask Portfolio


To put money for ya wallet:

  1. Link ya MetaMask wallet to portfolio.metamask.io
  2. Click di ‚ÄúBuy‚Äù tab to start am
  3. Pick ya area
  4. Pick how you wan pay
  5. Pick di coin and network wey you wan buy from (For example: ETH for Ethereum network)
  6. Put the amount you want in regular money (for example: $100 worth of ETH)
  7. All the prices from all the different people wey dey sell go show and pick one to move on.
  8. Dem go redirect you to their website, safe and sound, to finish de payment, and de funds go dey added for your MetaMask wallet.

Success! ü¶ä

For MetaMask Portfolio, the "Buy" thing wey dey there go allow you pump your wallet with any crypto wey you want, and you fit start to use am straight away. Whether you wan hold your ETH for profit, buy NFTs (special digital things you fit get), try out DeFi (decentralized finance), or even more things ‚Äî you fit do all these things now with account wey get money inside.

Shey you don dey ready to enter? Sabi plenti for metamask.io/portfolio/.

MetaMask Portfolio: Carry eye see and watch over all your web3 kain kain things

MetaMask Portfolio na ogbonge platform wey dey easy to use and get all your web3 things for one place, e go help you control everything yourself. Whether you wan use Dashboard, Buy, Swap, Bridge, Stake, you dey safe. We dey always work hard to make the dapp better and better with updates wey go make sense. Press here to sabi more about MetaMask Portfolio and wetin e fit do.

news.metaDescription: Use this guide to sabi how to buy crypto for MetaMask Portfolio from the very beginning reach the end.

nodes.title: MetaMask feature update: Account Sync
nodes.subtitle: Giving you more configurability across your devices.

childMarkdownRemark.html:
MetaMask has released a new feature called Account Sync ‚Äî available now on browser extension, ahead of mobile wallet availability coming soon. Account Sync allows you to unify account names and addresses across a wallet that has the same Secret Recovery Phrase. Enabling this optional setting means that you no longer have to go in and manually edit details across different devices. Part of MetaMask Profile Sync functionality, users‚Äô data privacy is ensured through end-to-end encryption, preventing MetaMask, and anyone else, from viewing or accessing this information.

A wallet with the same Secret Recovery Phrase can:

  • Sync MetaMask Extension across Chrome/Brave browsers
  • Sync MetaMask Extension across desktops or laptops
  • Sync MetaMask wallet across Extension and mobile app
  • Sync MetaMask mobile apps across mobile devices
  • Sync MetaMask wallet after install

How to enable Account Sync

Existing users

  1. Go to Settings.
  2. Click on Privacy & Security.
  3. Turn on ProfileSync.

New users

Account Sync is turned on by default. To disable:

  1. Go to Settings.
  2. Click on Privacy & Security.
  3. Turn off ProfileSync.

How it works

Updates will be reflected when you lock/unlock or close/open MetaMask Extension. For example, if you have MetaMask open on two devices, and you add an account or rename an account on device A, you will need to close/open or lock/unlock MetaMask from device B for these changes to be reflected.

Synchronization details

  • If device A has more accounts than device B, MetaMask will add these additional accounts to device B.
  • The most recently re-named account will be synchronized across devices.
  • If you turn off Account Sync, account names and newly added accounts will start to vary across devices.
  • Re-enabling Account Sync will re-sync your devices.

In addition to Account Sync, MetaMask Profile Sync also includes Account Activity Notifications, with more features rolling out this year.

Head to MetaMask Portfolio to enable Account Sync ‚Äî for seamless account management across devices. Check out our profile privacy and security guide for more ways we protect and manage user data.

nodes.metaDescription: MetaMask's new Account Sync feature  allows you to unify account names and addresses across a wallet that has the same Secret Recovery Phrase.

nodes.title: Introducing MetaMask Signature Insights Snaps
nodes.subtitle: A new way to stay protected with community-powered tools.

childMarkdownRemark.html:
Safety is paramount in today's digital world ‚Äî especially in web3, where users frequently interact with decentralized applications and manage valuable assets. A common vulnerability in the ecosystem is malicious signature requests, which lead unsuspecting users to authorize transactions that compromise their assets. This can happen by tricking people into signing something that allows a nefarious actor to transfer a users‚Äô assets.

To address this critical safety issue, MetaMask has introduced Signature Insight Snaps, a new category of security tools built by third-party developers. These Snaps empower users with greater transparency and control over signature requests, helping to identify and avoid potential threats.

Signature Insight Snaps integrate seamlessly with MetaMask. These tools work by analyzing the contents of requests, giving users insights into the signature‚Äôs purpose and potential risks. Leveraging knowledge from Signature Insight Snaps allows users to make more informed decisions, reducing the likelihood of falling victim to phishing attempts, unauthorized access, or other malicious activities. The added layer of security reinforces users' trust, and also fosters a safer environment for web3 interactions.

Discover our first Signature Insights Snaps

Kleros Scout is the first Snap to support Signature Insights. It decodes the content of signature requests, and identifies the addresses of any contracts you may be authorizing in the signature via Kleros‚Äôs decentralized token curated registries. It can then warn you if the contract you are interacting with is malicious.

Above, the Kleros Scout insight is displayed in the new signature request design. The insight shows that the contract being authorized by this signature request is the official Seaport 1.6 contract for NFT trading deployed by OpenSea.

ZyFi Paymaster Insights is our second Signature Insight Snap to launch. It improves the readability of signing transactions in the zkSync ecosystem, especially for paymaster-related transactions using txType 113. ZyFi Paymaster Insights adds helpful information about the ‚Äúfrom‚Äù and ‚Äúto‚Äù addresses for these paymaster-related transactions. Additionally, it provides extra information related to the paymaster, such as the address, type, gas fee token address, and gas fee token amount. This gives users more clarity on what they‚Äôre signing, helping them to avoid potentially malicious signatures.

Above, the ZyFi Paymaster Insight shows the from address, to address, and the paymaster type of the signature request on zkSync.

Install Kleros Scout Snap and ZyFi Paymaster Insights from the MetaMask Snaps Directory in MetaMask Extension 12.4.2 or later.

Build your own

Visit the MetaMask Developer Documentation to learn how you can build your own Signature Insight Snaps, and sign-up for our Builder Engagement Program so we can support you on your developer journey.

In the future, Signature Insights Snaps will be able to hook into alerts in signature requests. MetaMask will also offer more types of insights including information about origin URL of any request.

Head to the MetaMask Snaps Directory to discover security Snaps that will keep you safe in your web3 journey.

nodes.metaDescription: Explore MetaMask Signature Insights Snaps, which help to safeguard web3 users from malicious signature requests.

nodes.title: Making DeFi onboarding safer with MoonPay
nodes.subtitle: Meet the builders who are transforming web3, in our More With MetaMask Partner Series.

image.title: More secure with MetaMask and MoonPay
image.description: Making DeFi onboarding more secure with MetaMask and MoonPay.

childMarkdownRemark.html:
MetaMask is the gateway to the decentralized web, enabling you to do more. Users can connect to any dapp, on any network, from any device. From DeFi to DeSci, gaming to NFTs, and beyond: MetaMask is deeply passionate about the web3 community. The More With MetaMask Partner Series shines a light on builders who are innovating across web3. Next up, MoonPay.

MoonPay is a leading crypto company that lets users buy and sell digital assets directly with their MetaMask wallet. Since MoonPay‚Äôs partnership with MetaMask began in 2022, we‚Äôve been dedicated to simplifying the management of cryptocurrencies, while keeping users secure. Let‚Äôs dive into the ways our collaboration achieves this.

Streamlining DeFi onboarding

As the demand for self-custodial wallets has risen, so too has the need for robust and intuitive tools that give users a frictionless ‚Äúweb2-like‚Äù experience. In the past, the two haven‚Äôt always mixed well. Newcomers to crypto, who typically have the highest appetite for intuitive UX, tend to find DeFi overly complex.

Recognizing this tension, MoonPay saw an opportunity to bridge-the-gap by providing seamless cash-to-crypto onboarding to the world‚Äôs leading self-custodial wallet, MetaMask. Integrating with MoonPay allowed MetaMask‚Äôs millions of users to interface with DeFi through familiar payment options like credit cards, debit cards, Apple Pay, and Google Pay. It also allowed MetaMask users to benefit from MoonPay‚Äôs stringent security protocols.

Simplifying ramps to protect users

One of the key advantages of the integration is that users can purchase digital assets directly within MetaMask wallet ‚Äî eliminating the need to navigate multiple platforms. This approach smoothes out the process, while keeping users‚Äô information safe. By avoiding unnecessary third-party platforms, data exposure is minimized.

In addition to decreasing exposure by helping users stay within the platform, MoonPay is committed to protection and security in various ways:

  • Our ramps are built with advanced encryption technology like AES-256.
  • We comply with PCI-DSS Level 1, ISO 27001, and ISO 27018 standards, ensuring we meet stringent data security criteria.
  • Our systems have undergone independent audits for PCI-DSS Level 1, ISO 27001/27018, and SOC2 Type 2 certifications, giving users peace of mind that our safety standards don‚Äôt waver.
  • Our rigorous Anti-Money Laundering and Know Your Customer policies helps prevent bad actors from entering our ecosystem.

Creating a more secure web3

As we continue to work alongside MetaMask, our shared focus on safe, user-friendly solutions remains a cornerstone of this partnership. Together, we‚Äôre not only simplifying crypto onboarding for newcomers ‚Äì we‚Äôre setting the bar for what it means to prioritize security in web3.

Buying and selling crypto with your MetaMask wallet via MoonPay has never been easier. It‚Äôs easy, fast, and safe. Get started today.

nodes.metaTitle: Making DeFi onboarding safer with MoonPay
nodes.metaDescription: Find out how MetaMask and MoonPay enable DeFi onboarding that is secure and seamless.
